name: UAGJ2022 Coco's Rescue
description:
A visually-impaired accessible rhythm game where a robot finds a wolf pup in the woods.  

Sometimes it gets stuck at the end of the intro and we don't know why. If that happens to you, wait a minute, it sometimes fixes itself, or you can refresh and try again or try the downloadable versions.  

CREDITS

Code and Design by vazor222

Music, Sound, Code, and Design by Briakitten

Story, Voice, and Design by KinzoAdolpha85

Robot model and animation by Nate Platt
